text.div:
patientIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches based on the exact UUID of the patient record eg} /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?_id={uuid}

ResourcePatient
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPatient
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: patientIdSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the exact UUID of the patient record eg} /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?_id={uuid}
